summary: This Mod changes the appearance of the Hireling followers of Skyrim. This Mod will be frequently updated with new variants and new followers on a regular basis.
descriptionHtml:
$$$$$$$$ NEWS $$$$$$$$
CHECK THIS AMAZING MOD OUT! 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23755]Inhabitants of Skyrim Npc Overhaul by Rops1981[/url]
It will transform the faces of your Skyrim for the better.

Hey folks sorry if you downloaded the wrong file. I forgot to remove the dependency to apachii in the first upload. the new file is now correct. and it really is stand alone now! :)

version 1.2 update.
###NO MORE MOD REQUIREMENTS### 
Just use your favorite face and body textures.
New warpaint on Vorstag thanks to TairenSoul and Diethardt.
New warpaint on Belrand thanks to Diethardt.
New eyes for all Hirelings by LogRamm.
Jenassa\'s and Vorstag hairs by apachii.
Big thanks to Diethardt for the upscaled facetints!

Required for Angrenor replacer.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16266]Additional Vanilla Npc Follower Voice Types[/url]
You will not get his follower dialogue without this mod.

Recommended mods but not required.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by urshi[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145]Smooth male Body Normal Maps[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211]Female Face Tattoo by TairenSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791]Male Face Tattoo by TairenSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]Exstensible Follower Framework[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18820]Inhabitants of Skyrim[/url]
For the best looking presets and save games around!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21705]Dark Nemises Ebony Retex[/url]
For the ebony armor in most of the pics
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19826]elaborate textile[/url]
For Marcurio\'s robe.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31332/]Weathered and Worn Warpaints[/url]

To install it\'s easy just drop the .esp into the data folder. Tick the .esp on and enjoy! 
Also included are the facegen data to fix that dumb greyface bug.

**** Instructions for neck seam/tear bug ****
1. Open console `
2. Target specific npc and you will type
For Belrand - setnpcweight 80
For Vorstag - setnpcweight 100
For Jenassa - setnpcweight 30
For Stenvar - setnpcweight 100
For Eric The Slayer - setnpcweight 100
For Marcurio - setnpcweight 70
For Angrenor - setnpcweight 100
3. disable
4. enable
5. Save
6. Rinse/repeat
You now need to use the exact weight as used in the ck for this to actually work now.

Other mods by me.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22616]The Hirelings[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22524]The Companions by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21540]Vilkas and Farkas[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21749]Vizerin by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22155]Housecarls by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27247]Friends of the Dovahkiin[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23779]The Dovahkiins New Allies[/url]

Want your Skyrim to look like mine? try out these amazing ENBs I personally use. You can see them at work in my galleries and screenshots.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23812]Seasons of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]Synergy/Dark[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21350]Winterheart 2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]The Wilds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828]Bleak/Unbleak[/url]

Credit and thanks go the following for granting permission to include their wonderful work into mine.
LogRamm 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of beauty[/url]
Apachii
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

Thanks to TairenSoul and Diethardt for providing the warpaints and tats.
author: netherwalk
